mapper.sql: id, username, `password`, nickname, salt, icon_url, created_time, email, enabled
mapper.select: select * from User where username = #{username} and enabled = 1
mapper.insert: insert into User (username, `password`, nickname, salt, icon_url, created_time, email, enabled) values (#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iconUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enabled,jdbcType=BOOLEAN})

username,

email,

mapper.update:
update User
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon_url = #{iconUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=BOOLEAN},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
